metadata.title: Wednesday, 4th October, 2023
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to reclaim the Broken Hill Man Skull which was discovered in Kabwe in 1921 and later taken to London;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when routine maintenance works were last carried out on the D145 Road from Luangwa Bridge to Luangwa Town in Lusaka Province from the time the road was tarred todate;
(c) when the routine works will commence;
(d) when construction of the new Luangwa Bridge will commence; and
(e) why commencement of the project has delayed despite funds being secured.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to degazette the Old Chilenje Cemetery in Kabwata Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when rehabilitation of the Katete-Chadiza road will commence;
(b) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(c) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) what measures the Government is taking to pay salary arrears owed to Council workers, countrywide; and
(b) what the cause of the delay in paying employees their salaries, is.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development and Social Services
parts: (a) what the benefits of the Social Cash Transfer Programme are;
(b) what challenges were encountered in implementing the Programme, as of March, 2023; and

(c) what measures are being taken to resolve the challenges, including the sharing of National Registration Card numbers by beneficiaries. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Supply - Motion (29th September) - Resumption of Debate:Â  (Mr Chinkuli, MP). ___________________________
